situation.title: Students' work duty
situation.meta_description: Rules and recommendations for students' work duty.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

The whole system is under strain at the moment, so work duty has been introduced for students of specific fields.

In medical fields, this applies to 4th and 5th-year medical students of general medicine, 5th-year dental students, 5th-year pharmacy, students preparing for non-doctoral medical studies, Masters students of psychology, or students in their last year of medical secondary school. See the complete list (in Czech). 

Work duty also applies to students of pedagogical fields. See the complete list (in Czech). 

The right to issue the order lays in hands of specific regional authority, based on the permanent residence of the student. Once being selected, the order will be sent to you. Work duty could be ordered at any time during the state of emergency.

Travels related to work duty are exempt from the ban on free movement.

Thank you for your help during these tough times.
